tab_[class*=\"section\"]_1.content: Compare tech specsROG Xbox Ally XNext-gen power in your handsROG Xbox AllyHandheld freedom for everyoneOperating SystemROG Xbox Ally X and ROG Xbox AllyWindows 11 HomeComfort and InputROG Xbox Ally XContoured grips inspired by Xbox Wireless Controllers deliver all-day comfort, complete with impulse triggers for enhanced control.ABXY buttons / D-pad / L & R impulse triggers / L & R bumpers / Xbox button / View button / Menu button / Command Centre button / Library button / 2x assignable back buttons / 2x full-size analogue sticks / HD haptics / 6-Axis IMUROG Xbox AllyContoured grips inspired by Xbox Wireless Controllers deliver all-day comfort.ABXY buttons / D-pad / L & R Hall Effect analogue triggers / L & R bumpers / Xbox button / View button / Menu button / Command Centre button / Library button / 2x assignable back buttons / 2x full-size analogue sticks / HD haptics / 6-Axis IMUProcessorROG Xbox Ally XAMD Ryzen™ AI Z2 Extreme ProcessorROG Xbox AllyAMD Ryzen™ Z2 A ProcessorMemoryROG

      Animation showing the boot up sequence for the ROG Xbox Ally X

      Xbox full screen experience

      Power on directly into the Xbox full screen experience for a dedicated gaming experience inspired and optimised specifically for handheld gaming.

      Game Bar

      Press the Xbox button for quick access to essential tools and customisable widgets with Game Bar. Hold the Xbox button to navigate all open apps.

      Aggregated library

      Access supported games anywhere you go from Xbox and other PC game storefronts.

      Progress goes with you

      Bring all your game saves, add-ons and achievements along with games that are Xbox Play Anywhere.1

      ","class":"theme-dark video-cp static48","campsiteName":"video-hero-with-content-placements"},{"description":"

      Animation displaying Hollow Knight silk song, South of Midnight, No Man’s Sky and Gears tactic on an ROG Xbox Ally X

      EXPLORE GAME PASS
      ","class":"theme-dark game-your-way videoHero tall-mobile","campsiteName":"hero-transparent-game-your-way"},{"description":"

      EXPLORE CLOUD GAMING
      ","class":"theme-black videoHero custom-hero cloud","campsiteName":"video-hero-cloud-gaming"},{"description":"

      EXPLORE XBOX PLAY ANYWHERE
      ","class":"buy-once custom-hero","campsiteName":"hero-transparent-play-anywhere"},{"description":"

      Animation of AMD Ryzen AI Z2 Extreme processor

      Xbox power in your hands

      Powered by the latest ultra-efficient AMD Ryzen™ AI Z2 Extreme and Z2 A processors

      Inspired by Xbox controls

      Enjoy Xbox features like iconic ABXY buttons and familiar contoured grips

      Xbox button

      Press the Xbox button to get instant access to Game Bar, customisable widgets and more

      7" display

      ","class":"theme-black no-heading mosaic-custom","campsiteName":"mosaic-custom"},{"description":"

      Compare tech specs

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      Next-gen power in your hands

      ROG Xbox Ally

      Handheld freedom for everyone

      Operating System

      ROG Xbox Ally X and ROG Xbox Ally

      Windows 11 Home

      Comfort and Input

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      Contoured grips inspired by Xbox Wireless Controllers deliver all-day comfort, complete with impulse triggers for enhanced control.
      ABXY buttons / D-pad / L & R impulse triggers / L & R bumpers / Xbox button / View button / Menu button / Command Centre button / Library button / 2x assignable back buttons / 2x full-size analogue sticks / HD haptics / 6-Axis IMU

      ROG Xbox Ally

      Contoured grips inspired by Xbox Wireless Controllers deliver all-day comfort.
      ABXY buttons / D-pad / L & R Hall Effect analogue triggers / L & R bumpers / Xbox button / View button / Menu button / Command Centre button / Library button / 2x assignable back buttons / 2x full-size analogue sticks / HD haptics / 6-Axis IMU

      Processor

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      AMD Ryzen™ AI Z2 Extreme Processor

      ROG Xbox Ally

      AMD Ryzen™ Z2 A Processor

      Memory

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      24 GB LPDDR5X-8000

      ROG Xbox Ally

      16 GB LPDDR5X-6400

      Storage

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      1 TB M.2 2280 SSD for easier upgrade

      ROG Xbox Ally

      512 GB M.2 2280 SSD for easier upgrade

      Display

      ROG Xbox Ally X and ROG Xbox Ally

      7" FHD (1080p) IPS, 500 nits, 16:9
      120Hz refresh rate
      AMD FreeSync™ Premium (Variable Refresh Rate)
      Corning Gorilla Glass Victus + DXC Anti-Reflection

      IO Ports

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      1x USB 4 Type-C with DisplayPort™ 2.1 / Power Delivery 3.0, Thunderbolt™ 4 compatible
      1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C with DisplayPort™ 2.1 / Power Delivery 3.0
      1x UHS-II microSD card reader (supports SD, SDXC and SDHC; UHS-I with DDR200 mode)
      1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack

      ROG Xbox Ally

      2x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C with DisplayPort™ 1.4 / Power Delivery 3.0
      1x UHS-II microSD card reader (supports SD, SDXC and SDHC)
      1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack

      Network and Communication

      ROG Xbox Ally X and ROG Xbox Ally

      WiFi 6E (2 x 2) + Bluetooth 5.4

      Dimensions

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      290.8*121.5*50.7mm
      715g

      ROG Xbox Ally

      290.8*121.5*50.7mm
      670g

      Battery

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      80Wh

      ROG Xbox Ally

      60Wh

      Included

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      ROG Xbox Ally X
      65W charger
      Stand

      ROG Xbox Ally

      ROG Xbox Ally

Power of Xbox. Freedom of Windows. Craftmanship of ROG.
Power on directly into the Xbox full screen experience for a dedicated gaming experience inspired and optimised specifically for handheld gaming.
Press the Xbox button for quick access to essential tools and customisable widgets with Game Bar. Hold the Xbox button to navigate all open apps.
Access supported games anywhere you go from Xbox and other PC game storefronts.
Bring all your game saves, add-ons and achievements along with games that are Xbox Play Anywhere.1
Stream hundreds of high-quality games from the Game Pass library plus select games you own.1
Stream games with cloud gaming, including select games you own or buy (requires Game Pass membership).2
Download select PC games to play on the go. When you own a game that is Xbox Play Anywhere, it's yours to play across PC, Xbox console, and supported gaming handhelds at no additional cost.1
Play games installed on your Xbox console remotely from your ROG Xbox Ally X and ROG Xbox Ally.3
DRAG OR USE LEFT/RIGHTARROWS TO ROTATE 360º
DRAG OR USE LEFT/RIGHTARROWS TO ROTATE 360º
Powered by the latest ultra-efficient AMD Ryzen™ AI Z2 Extreme and Z2 A processors
Enjoy Xbox features like iconic ABXY buttons and familiar contoured grips
Press the Xbox button to get instant access to Game Bar, customisable widgets and more
Peak efficiency paired with a 60Wh or 80Wh battery to play for hours
Experience pixel perfect 120hz FHD display at 1080p with Corning Gorilla Glass Victus
Next-gen power in your hands
Handheld freedom for everyone

Contoured grips inspired by Xbox Wireless Controllers deliver all-day comfort, complete with impulse triggers for enhanced control.ABXY buttons / D-pad / L & R impulse triggers / L & R bumpers / Xbox button / View button / Menu button / Command Centre button / Library button / 2x assignable back buttons / 2x full-size analogue sticks / HD haptics / 6-Axis IMU

Contoured grips inspired by Xbox Wireless Controllers deliver all-day comfort.ABXY buttons / D-pad / L & R Hall Effect analogue triggers / L & R bumpers / Xbox button / View button / Menu button / Command Centre button / Library button / 2x assignable back buttons / 2x full-size analogue sticks / HD haptics / 6-Axis IMU
AMD Ryzen™ AI Z2 Extreme Processor
AMD Ryzen™ Z2 A Processor
1 TB M.2 2280 SSD for easier upgrade
512 GB M.2 2280 SSD for easier upgrade
7" FHD (1080p) IPS, 500 nits, 16:9120Hz refresh rateAMD FreeSync™ Premium (Variable Refresh Rate)Corning Gorilla Glass Victus + DXC Anti-Reflection

1x USB 4 Type-C with DisplayPort™ 2.1 / Power Delivery 3.0, Thunderbolt™ 4 compatible1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C with DisplayPort™ 2.1 / Power Delivery 3.01x UHS-II microSD card reader (supports SD, SDXC and SDHC; UHS-I with DDR200 mode)1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack
2x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C with DisplayPort™ 1.4 / Power Delivery 3.01x UHS-II microSD card reader (supports SD, SDXC and SDHC)1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack
WiFi 6E (2 x 2) + Bluetooth 5.4

2. Xbox Cloud Gaming (Beta) requires Game Pass Ultimate subscription and supported device (both sold separately). See cloud gaming catalogue (xbox.com/play).Game Pass Ultimate:terms and exclusions apply. Game catalogue varies over time, by region, device and Game Pass plan. For individual in-game benefit terms, see each game’s benefit offering by launching Xbox PC app.

3. Requires internet connection (ISP fees apply). Requires supported device (mobile data charges may apply) and games. Online console multiplayer (including via Xbox remote play) requires Xbox Game Pass Ultimate, Standard, or Core, memberships sold separately.

gaming_features.stream: 2. Xbox Cloud Gaming (Beta) requires Game Pass Ultimate subscription and supported device (both sold separately). Cloud playable games not included with Game Pass Ultimate are sold separately, and may be made available with Game Pass Ultimate in the future. Game catalogue varies. Stream directly on Xbox consoles, or with the Xbox app or atxbox.com/playon supported devices. Select regions (xbox.com/regions) and devices atxbox.com/cloud-devices. See cloud gaming catalogue (xbox.com/play).Game Pass Ultimate:terms and exclusions apply. Game catalogue varies over time, by region, device and Game Pass plan. Seehttps://www.xbox.com/gamepass,https://www.ea.com/ea-play/terms.Free to Play Games:Free-to-play games and in-game benefits are subject to change. For individual in-game benefit terms, see each game’s benefit offering by launching Xbox PC app.

      Animation showing the boot up sequence for the ROG Xbox Ally X

      Xbox full screen experience

      Power on directly into the Xbox full screen experience for a dedicated gaming experience inspired and optimised specifically for handheld gaming.

      Game Bar

      Press the Xbox button for quick access to essential tools and customisable widgets with Game Bar. Hold the Xbox button to navigate all open apps.

      Aggregated library

      Access supported games anywhere you go from Xbox and other PC game storefronts.

      Progress goes with you

      Bring all your game saves, add-ons and achievements along with games that are Xbox Play Anywhere.1

      ","class":"theme-dark video-cp static48","campsiteName":"video-hero-with-content-placements"},{"description":"

      EXPLORE GAME PASS
      ","class":"theme-dark game-your-way videoHero tall-mobile","campsiteName":"hero-transparent-game-your-way"},{"description":"

      Animation of AMD Ryzen AI Z2 Extreme processor

      Xbox power in your hands

      Powered by the latest ultra-efficient AMD Ryzen™ AI Z2 Extreme and Z2 A processors

      Inspired by Xbox controls

      Enjoy Xbox features like iconic ABXY buttons and familiar contoured grips

      Xbox button

      Press the Xbox button to get instant access to Game Bar, customisable widgets and more

      Battery efficiency

      Peak efficiency paired with a 60Wh or 80Wh battery to play for hours

      7" display

      Experience pixel perfect 120hz FHD display at 1080p with Corning Gorilla Glass Victus

      ","class":"theme-black no-heading mosaic-custom","campsiteName":"mosaic-custom"},{"description":"

      Compare tech specs

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      Next-gen power in your hands

      ROG Xbox Ally

      Handheld freedom for everyone

      Operating System

      ROG Xbox Ally X and ROG Xbox Ally

      Windows 11 Home

      Comfort and Input

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      Contoured grips inspired by Xbox Wireless Controllers deliver all-day comfort, complete with impulse triggers for enhanced control.
      ABXY buttons / D-pad / L & R impulse triggers / L & R bumpers / Xbox button / View button / Menu button / Command Centre button / Library button / 2x assignable back buttons / 2x full-size analogue sticks / HD haptics / 6-Axis IMU

      ROG Xbox Ally

      Contoured grips inspired by Xbox Wireless Controllers deliver all-day comfort.
      ABXY buttons / D-pad / L & R Hall Effect analogue triggers / L & R bumpers / Xbox button / View button / Menu button / Command Centre button / Library button / 2x assignable back buttons / 2x full-size analogue sticks / HD haptics / 6-Axis IMU

      Processor

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      AMD Ryzen™ AI Z2 Extreme Processor

      ROG Xbox Ally

      AMD Ryzen™ Z2 A Processor

      Memory

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      24 GB LPDDR5X-8000

      ROG Xbox Ally

      16 GB LPDDR5X-6400

      Storage

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      1 TB M.2 2280 SSD for easier upgrade

      ROG Xbox Ally

      512 GB M.2 2280 SSD for easier upgrade

      Display

      ROG Xbox Ally X and ROG Xbox Ally

      7" FHD (1080p) IPS, 500 nits, 16:9
      120Hz refresh rate
      AMD FreeSync™ Premium (Variable Refresh Rate)
      Corning Gorilla Glass Victus + DXC Anti-Reflection

      IO Ports

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      1x USB 4 Type-C with DisplayPort™ 2.1 / Power Delivery 3.0, Thunderbolt™ 4 compatible
      1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C with DisplayPort™ 2.1 / Power Delivery 3.0
      1x UHS-II microSD card reader (supports SD, SDXC and SDHC; UHS-I with DDR200 mode)
      1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack

      ROG Xbox Ally

      2x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C with DisplayPort™ 1.4 / Power Delivery 3.0
      1x UHS-II microSD card reader (supports SD, SDXC and SDHC)
      1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack

      Network and Communication

      ROG Xbox Ally X and ROG Xbox Ally

      WiFi 6E (2 x 2) + Bluetooth 5.4

      Dimensions

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      290.8*121.5*50.7mm
      715g

      ROG Xbox Ally

      290.8*121.5*50.7mm
      670g

      Battery

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      80Wh

      ROG Xbox Ally

      60Wh

      Included

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      ROG Xbox Ally X
      65W charger
      Stand

      ROG Xbox Ally

      ROG Xbox Ally
      65W charger
      Stand

      ","class":"compare pad48","campsiteName":"comparison-table"},{"description":"

      *Prices are estimated retailer prices and may vary by retailer.

      1. Requires internet connection. PC hardware requirements may vary for games on Windows 10/11.

      2. Xbox Cloud Gaming (Beta) requires Game Pass Ultimate subscription and supported device (both sold separately). Cloud playable games not included with Game Pass Ultimate are sold separately, and may be made available with Game Pass Ultimate in the future. Game catalogue varies. Stream directly on Xbox consoles, or with the Xbox app or at xbox.com/play on supported devices. Select regions (xbox.com/regions) and devices at xbox.com/cloud-devices. See cloud gaming catalogue (xbox.com/play). Game Pass Ultimate: terms and exclusions apply. Game catalogue varies over time, by region, device and Game Pass plan. See https://www.xbox.com/gamepass, https://www.ea.com/ea-play/terms. Free to Play Games: Free-to-play games and in-game benefits are subject to change. For individual in-game benefit terms, see each game’s benefit offering by launching Xbox PC app.

      3. Requires internet connection (ISP fees apply). Requires supported device (mobile data charges may apply) and games. Xbox Series X|S or Xbox One must have remote features enabled and must be turned on or in Sleep mode. Online console multiplayer (including via Xbox remote play) requires Xbox Game Pass Ultimate, Standard, or Core, memberships sold separately.

      All specifications are subject to change without notice. Please check with your supplier for exact offers. Products may not be available in all markets.

      Specifications and features vary by model and all images are illustrative. Please refer to specification pages for full details.

      PCB colour and bundled software versions are subject to change without notice.

Online console multiplayer (including via Xbox remote play) requires Xbox Game Pass Ultimate, Standard, or Core, memberships sold separately.

Stream directly on Xbox consoles, or with the Xbox app or atxbox.com/playon supported devices. Select regions (xbox.com/regions) and devices atxbox.com/cloud-devices.       Animation showing the boot up sequence for the ROG Xbox Ally X

      Xbox full screen experience

      Power on directly into the Xbox full screen experience for a dedicated gaming experience inspired and optimised specifically for handheld gaming.

      Game Bar

      Press the Xbox button for quick access to essential tools and customisable widgets with Game Bar. Hold the Xbox button to navigate all open apps.

      Aggregated library

      Access supported games anywhere you go from Xbox and other PC game storefronts.

      Progress goes with you

      Bring all your game saves, add-ons and achievements along with games that are Xbox Play Anywhere.1

      ","class":"theme-dark video-cp static48","campsiteName":"video-hero-with-content-placements"},{"description":"

      EXPLORE GAME PASS
      ","class":"theme-dark game-your-way videoHero tall-mobile","campsiteName":"hero-transparent-game-your-way"},{"description":"

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      Next-gen power in your hands

      ROG Xbox Ally

      Handheld freedom for everyone

      Operating System

      ROG Xbox Ally X and ROG Xbox Ally

      Windows 11 Home

      Comfort and Input

      ROG Xbox Ally X

      Contoured grips inspired by Xbox Wireless Controllers deliver all-day comfort, complete with impulse triggers for enhanced control.
      ABXY buttons / D-pad / L & R impulse triggers / L & R bumpers / Xbox button / View button / Menu button / Command Centre button / Library button / 2x assignable back buttons / 2x full-size analogue sticks / HD haptics / 6-Axis IMU

pricing_and_availability.cost: Download select PC games to play on the go. When you own a game that is Xbox Play Anywhere, it's yours to play across PC, Xbox console, and supported gaming handhelds at no additional cost.1
pricing_and_availability.available: All specifications are subject to change without notice. Please check with your supplier for exact offers. Products may not be available in all markets.

page_metadata.title: ROG Xbox Ally X & ROG Xbox Ally – Available 16 October, 2025 | Xbox
page_metadata.meta_description: Get seamless PC gaming on the go with ROG Xbox Ally X & ROG Xbox Ally gaming handhelds. Power on into the Xbox full screen experience optimised for handheld gaming.
page_metadata.meta_keywords: ROG Xbox Ally, ROG Xbox Ally X, Xbox handheld, Xbox portable, Xbox portable gaming, portable Xbox, handheld gaming with Xbox, Xbox handheld console, Xbox portable console, Xbox handheld device, Xbox gaming handheld, cloud gaming handheld, best handheld for Xbox Game Pass
